short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search any Youtube video, user, or channel from your address bar in Chrome!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Search any Youtube video, user, or channel from your address bar in Chrome! Type the keyword, "yous" followed by TAB. After this you can type your search query and hit ENTER! You also have several other options. After the TAB, type "v " followed by your query to search only videos. Also, type "c " or "u " to search only channels or users, respectively.
